text: Allaha, yini urdhbadese sthapana karechena akasamandalike stambha byatita. Tomara segulo dekha. Atahpara tini arasera upara adhisthita hayechena. Ebam surya o candrake karme niyojita karechena. Pratyeke nirdista samaya motabeka abartana kare. Tini sakala bisaya paricalana karena, nidarsanasamuha prakasa karena, yate tomara sbiya palanakartara sathe saksata sambandhe niscita bisbasi ha'o.
